descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f4cccc]This is  Niah, My very fist attempt (a very poor one at that) at a follower mod.[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]Requirements :[/color]
[color=#ffe599]Skyrim up to date.
[/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f4cccc]The armor is also not included it is the [/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f4f4f4]black sacrament armor by [/color][/font][b][color=#f4f4f4]AmethystDeceiver
[/color][color=#f4f4f4](Please tell me if there are any bugs and i can attemp to fix them!) [/color]
[color=#d9d2e9]You can find her in the frostfruit inn in Rorikstead
[/color]Her body type is Unp
Class: Spellsword
She comes in dark brotherhood armor and her own special sword
Perks: Light foot, quiet casting and Armsman
She levels up with the player and has an array of spell in her arsenal.  
[/b]You can also marry her[/center][center]












Credits [color=#f4f4f4]
Enhanced character edit by [/color][b][color=#f4f4f4]ECE team[/color][/b][color=#f4f4f4]
[/color]Fair skin complexion by HHaleyy
KS hairdos by Kalilies, shocky and stealthic
UNP by [b]dimon99[/b]

Mods used in screen shots
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f4f4f4]Project enb 
[/color][/font][size=2]Arise - Chapter 1 - The Black Sacrament[/size] [color=#f4f4f4]by [b]AmethystDeceiver[/b][/color][/center]
author: LadyJay
